column4: Hey guys, im a new ubuntu user, and a new linux user. I installed python using the synaptic packet manager, and i cant seem to find where it installed to. I did the same thing for thunderbird and had no problems, it went right into the Internet tab. anyone got any ideas?
thanks guys, so far good impressions comming from windows all my life
you might want to search synaptic (ctl-f) python ide
